page.title: 07Jam Recipe
page.content: A farmers wife will often collect hedgerow fruits for her jam making, these being mainly elderberry and blackberry. Blackberry and Apple Jam _-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_- 2lb.cooking Apples.pared,cored and sliced. 2/3 cup water,juice of 2 lemons. 2lb. Blackberries, 4lb. sugar Simmer the apples in water and lemon juice, until tender (about 15 mins). Add the blackberries and sugar and boil quickly until setting point is reached (test by dropping small amount onto a saucer,when quite cold it should wrinkle when pushed with forefinger). Pour into hot sterilised jars immediately and seal.
